DOC.detailed_description: Using 2-arm , randomize , control trial ( RCT ) among congestive heart failure ( CHF ) patient University Pennsylvania Health System ( UPHS ) , test effectiveness apply automate hover improve outcome among CHF patient high risk readmission . This leverage electronic medical record ( EMR ) , Penn Data Store ( electronic repository use identify study cohort ) , NIH-funded Way Health platform , provide linkage home-based remote monitoring device server provide automated feedback patient . The primary outcome hospital readmission rate 12 month study enrollment . Secondary outcome include total cost hospitalization .
